snippet: The day before Tyler Clementi’s suicide, the defendant Dharun Ravi told his friend Michelle Huang of capturing images of his roommate on a webcam.
abstract: Michelle Huang testifies at trial of Dharun Ravi that Ravi encouraged her to watch feed from webcam he had trained on a bed where he expected his Rutgers University roommate Tyler Clementi to have a tryst with another man; Ravi, charged with invasion of privacy and bias intimidation, used webcam one day before Clementi jumped to his death from the George Washington Bridge.
lead_paragraph: The day before Tyler Clementi’s suicide, the defendant Dharun Ravi told his friend Michelle Huang of capturing images of his roommate on a webcam.

headline.seo: Dharun Ravi Wrote of Wanting to Keep ‘Gays Away’
headline.main: Rutgers Defendant Wrote of Keeping ‘Gays Away’
headline.print_headline: Day Before Rutgers Roommate’s Suicide, Defendant Wrote: ‘Keep the Gays Away’

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
